champ_0270_rival_02:
Oh man, I can tell just looking at you! You did it,
right? You became a Champion?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_no_01:
Ha, you’ve got jokes! But seriously—you did
become a Champion, right?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_no_02:
C’mon, it’s me! You don’t have to lie! Just tell
me—you became a Champion, right?![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_no_03:
OK, wait! You DID become a Champion, though,
didn’t you?![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_03: Ha haaa! I knew all along![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_04:
I got word from La Primera when you cleared the
Elite Test![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_05:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Oh man, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
I’m a\r
Champion,\r
and\r
now,\r
you’re\r
a Champion![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_06:
Which means we’re true equals! You and me,
both Champion-ranked Trainers! This is amazing![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_07:
Now that you’ve made it here, I’ve got one thing
to say.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_08: Let’s you and me be best rivals for life![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_no_05:
Oops! Couldn’t hear you! I’ll say it again: let’s
you and me be best rivals for life![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_no_06:
Sorry, not going to stop until I hear a yes—
let’s you and me be best rivals for life![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_no_07: OK, wait! You WILL be my rival, won’t you?![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_10:
All right! You know what rivals do? Battle their
absolute hearts out![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_11:
I’m gonna hit you with EVERYTHING this time!
You ready?![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_chairman_01: Do wait a moment, Champion Nemona.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0270_chairman_02a:
[VAR BD06(0000)]The Champion Assessment has only just ended.
I believe a rest is in order for Champion\r
[VAR TRNAME(0000)],\r
[VAR PKNAME(0001)],\r
and\r
the others.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0270_chairman_02b:
[VAR BD06(0000)]The Champion Assessment has only just ended.
I believe a rest is in order for Champion\r
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]\r
and [VAR PKNAME(0001)].[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0270_chairman_03:
Champions must be understanding toward
their opponents.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0270_rival_14:
[VAR BD06(0000)]There I go getting overexcited again! Sorry,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]\r
and\r
[VAR PKNAME(0001)].[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_chairman_04:
I also must ask—is this roadside really the setting
you two want for your first battle as true equals\r
and rivals?[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0270_rival_15:
Hmm... Now that you mention it, that’s a
good point.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_16:
In that case, can we use one of the Pokémon
League battle courts?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_chairman_05:
Surely there’s somewhere more fitting. A place
with special meaning for the two of you, perhaps.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0270_rival_17:
Special meaning, huh? Hmm... Let me see...
Anywhere leap to mind, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_answer_a01:
Haha! Our beach out back, huh? Yeah, the place
where we had our first battle might work.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_answer_a02:
But on the other hand, to me it’s just kind of...
my backyard, y’know? A little ordinary.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_chairman_answer_c01:
The Treasure Eatery? Is it significant to the two of
you somehow?[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0270_chairman_answer_c02:
Ah, are you thinking of it ’cause it’s got the
Medali Gym’s battle court?\c
I guess it does bring back memories...of Larry...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_chairman_answer_c03:
Larry may not appreciate the surprise visit.\c
If you’ve any other suitable places in mind, would
you prioritize them instead, please?[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0270_rival_18:
Mesagoza? Oooh, good call! The place where we
set out on our journey![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_19:
That reminds me, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]...\c
Remember back when Director Clavell explained
the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Treasure Hunt[VAR COLOR(0000)]? Y’know how he told us to go\r
in search of our own treasure?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_20:
Well, I know what treasure I got out of all this:
I found a true rival—someone who can stand up\r
to me at my full capabilities.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_21:
That’s right—I mean you! I’m so glad I got to
meet you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_rival_23:
I’ll be waiting for you at the battle court in
Mesagoza’s central plaza! See ya there![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0270_chairman_06:
The respect you two share is palpable. Even a bit
enviable, to be honest.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0270_chairman_07:
I am known as La Primera—but even when facing
me in the final test of her Champion Assessment,\r
Champion Nemona didn’t reveal her full might.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0270_chairman_08:
In you, I suspect she has found someone she can
battle without holding anything back.[VAR 0114(0011)]
